attributes.action: stop this Job experience thing not everyone has the experience to work START TRAINING
attributes.additional_details: Well i dont think its fair that every job people apply for that we need experience at the end of the day how can PEOPLE expect us to have experience if they wont let us try think its disgraceful how we get treated they say you lot at the government want people off benefits well take this job experience thing off the table because not many people have the experience so give US a chance to prove our selfs !
